ProductConfigFlowAssignment.name: ProductConfigFlowAssignment
ProductConfigFlowAssignment.description: A junction object that represents the many-to-many relationship between Product Configuration Flow, Product, and Product Classification.

AssignmentType.description: Specifies whether the Product Configuration Flow is assigned to the primary product or classification, or to dynamic components added within a bundle.

ProductClassificationId.description: The product classification associated with the Product Configuration Flow.

ProductConfigurationFlowId.description: The Product Configuration Flow associated with the Product Classification or Product.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the Product Configuration Flow.
